entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 12:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
